name: 葛瑞斐
objective:
學術英語
本課程專為本科生設計，旨在培養他們的學術英語語言技能，以便在英語授課的大學課程中取得成功。 本課程將讓學生積極參與在現實生活中的學術大學講座和專業工作場所環境中遇到的各種學術聽、讀、寫和口語活動。 本學期的主題是體育與文化。

English for Academic Purposes
This course is designed for undergraduate students to develop their academic English language skills for success in English-medium university coursework. This course will engage students with active participation in a variety of academic listening, reading, writing, and speaking activities that they would encounter in real-life academic university lectures and professional workplace environments.  The theme of this semester is Sport and Culture.
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction
	
	  2-5: Sports in the News	

          6-8: Sports and History

          9: Midterm week

         10-13: Sports and Society

         14-17: Sports and Ethics
	
	 18: Finals week
